sources.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1957)
sources.description: Plan 9 from Outer Space is often regarded as one of the most infamous cult films in cinematic history, directed by Ed Wood. The story revolves around an extraterrestrial invasion aimed at stopping humanity from creating a dangerous doomsday weapon that could annihilate the universe.Â The aliens, specifically a character named Eros, learn that humans are close to inventing a weapon that might lead to their own destruction. To prevent this, they devise "Plan 9," which involves resurrecting the dead to create chaos on Earth. The aliens use a method dubbed "Plan 9" to reanimate the deceased, including a couple named Jeffrey and his wife, who becomes one of the zombies. These zombies are controlled by the aliens and roam the earth, causing panic.A couple of police officers and a reporter become involved as they encounter the walking dead. They try to investigate the strange occurrences, leading to various interactions with the reanimated corpses.As the chaos escalates, the humans come to realize the aliens' intentions. They ultimately confront the aliens in a desperate attempt to save humanity while grappling with their resurrected neighbors.

sources.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1957) Tor Johnson, Vampira, Tom Keene, Bela Lugosi | Full Movie, subtitles
sources.description:
Aliens Resurrecting The Dead! Flying Saucers Over Hollywood!
Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.

Original title: Plan 9 from Outer Space (1957)


Colorized version: https://youtu.be/37VERat3G7c

Director & Writer: Edward D. Wood Jr.
Cast: Bela Lugosi, Tor Johnson, Mona McKinnon, Gregory Walcott, Tom Keene, Lyle Talbot
Genres: B-movie, Cult film, Horror, Sci-Fi
Budget: $60,000


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYT_Zk0DHuuOUVtCef1TewS
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: In California, an old man (Bela Lugosi) grieves the loss of his wife (Vampira) and on the next day he also dies. However, the space soldier Eros and his mate Tanna use an electric device to resurrect them both and the strong Inspector Clay who was murdered by the couple. Their intention is not to conquer Earth but to stop mankind from developing the powerful bomb "Solaranite" that would threaten the universe. When the population of Hollywood and Washington DC sees flying saucers in the sky, a colonel, a police lieutenant, a commercial pilot, his wife and a policeman try to stop the aliens.
metadata.Actors: Gregory Walcott, Tom Keene, Mona McKinnon
